message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $130.  What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within $100. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $100?
Hi Bob, I understand your position. While $130 is my ideal price, I am willing to come down a bit. Could you meet me halfway at $115?
